name: Image Browser
description: This widget allows you to browse a set of images that can be specified in a JSON file or by a flickr tag.

sourceType.description: Where the images are coming from. Flickr calls directly to Flickr using JSONP and requires the tags argument be specified. JSON requires a url to be specified to a file.

url.description: The url to a JSON Source.

tags.description: One or more comma separated tag names that will be looked up. Only flickr images tags all tags are returned.

scaleIcons.description: Whether to resize the icons based on the size of the widget. This is useful when using small sizes.

width.description: Width of the widget. If not set the widget will auto fill to the width of whatever container it is in.

height.description: Width of the widget. If not set the widget will auto fill to the height of whatever container it is in.

apikey.description: Api key used to retrieve flickr photos. You can limited to retrieve 20 photos without an API key set.
